payload.description: The payload needs to be first encrypted and afterwards gzipped. the base64 repesentation of gezipped bytes will be added as payload

payLoadSignature.description: Signature key of the signed payload, to verify by whom the encrypted message has been created

description.description: Description of the purpose of the link

href.description: the- encrypted URL that should be called, to receive additional encrypted unstructured data, such as pdf, pictures, etc.

rel.description: The IG B2B Standard the links belongs to.

encryptionKey.description: The with the public key of the receiver encrypted symmetric key to decrypt the data (KEK)

publicKeyVersion.description: The version of the public key used to encrypt the encryptionKey (DEK)

signatureKeyVersion.description: The version of the signature key, that was used to sign
